organic.title: The Stellate Ganglion Center
organic.snippet: The Stellate Ganglion Center offers injection therapy for PTSD, anxiety, depression, and long-COVID. Stellate ganglion blocks reset the "fight or flight" response.

organic.title: About Us - The Stellate Ganglion Center
organic.snippet: The Stellate Ganglion Center was founded to increase treatment options available to trauma and anxiety patients in New Mexico.

organic.title: SGB Treatment Center
organic.snippet: SGB Treatment Center offers Stellate Ganglion Block for PTSD, pioneered by Dr. Mulvaney. Ultrasound-guided, it's safe, effective, and less painful. 5-star reviews and published research.

organic.title: The Stellate Ganglion Center - Facebook
organic.snippet: Check out our website for more information: www.stellateganglioncenter.com #PTSD #anxiety #stellateganglionblock #trauma #mentalhealthawareness · No photo ...

organic.title: Stellate Ganglion Blocks - Pain Solutions
organic.snippet: A Stellate Ganglion Block is an injection of local anesthetic near the stellate ganglion, temporarily turning off these specialized nerves.
